metadata.description: The Warren Ellis smash-hit series has turned Anna Mercury into everyone's favorite red-head with an attitude! Now this full-color Artbook gives the best artists in the industry a chance to draw the leather-clad vixen in gorgeous never-before-seen pinups straight from her New Ataraxia Mission! Super-stars delivering works of art inside include Juan Jose Ryp, Paul Duffield, Tim Seeley, Matt Martin, Richard Ortiz, and a huge selection of new work from series artist Facundo Percio!
metadata.name: Anna Mercury Artbook, Vol. 1
